actions.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 305, 1 Present (Roll no. 84).
Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Scott (VA).

Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-21 to make significant investments in education, job training, transportation and infrastructure, and advanced research and development programs. The amendment protects the social safety net without cutting Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid, or SNAP. The amendment raises new revenue by closing corporate tax loopholes and preferences. The amendment reduces the annual budget deficit to 1.8% of GDP by FY 2023.
purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-21 and offered as the Congressional Black Caucus proposal.
